name: Questionable Racing
description:
A great party game for 2 to 4 players where driving skill is just as important as your ability to multitask.

While playing, all players will be asked different random questions (very simple ones), the first player to answer correctly gets a speed boost! But beware! If you answer wrong or not at all; you will be slowed severely down!

Be on your wits and race for the win!

Web version

NOTE! You will need controllers in order to play this game (preferably X-Box controllers)

Controls:
Start: Opt-in at menu
R1/L1: Change character
R2: Accelerate
L2: Reverse
Left Analog Stick: Steer
A, B: Answer buttons
